# Metadata {.unnumbered}

```{r metadata-table}
revs <- map_chr(
  metadata[["reviewer"]],
  \(x) x$name |> paste(collapse = " ")
)
fms <-  map_chr(
  metadata[["file_manager"]],
  \(x) x$name |> paste(collapse = " ")
)
tibble(
  reviewers = revs,
  documentbeheerder = fms,
  protocolcode = metadata[["protocol_code"]],
  versienummer = metadata[["version_number"]],
  taal = metadata[["language"]]
) %>%
  pander::pander(split.tables = Inf)
rm(revs, fms)
```
